verbs.description: After Paul Manafort [V: was] locked up for witness tampering pending trial on tax evasion , fraud and money laundering , Trump was asked if he would pardon his former campaign manager . He deflected , saying he did n’t want to discuss that . But Rudy Giuliani made sure Manafort got the message loud and clear : White House lawyer Rudolph W. …
